post.body: Out of the norm is great for an interview I'd say
Unless it's a geoloical survey website ;)
Thanks the "ghost hand" in your new photo
Who's buying you CS4?
Oh nos! My apartment! *kidding*
Thanks for the laugh this morning. Needed it.
already did
Unfortunately dougman.com is already taken
I don't think you can "sell" your seat. It's actually determed by a complex system similar to "dibs" or "shotgun"
I've seen multiple blog topics integrated into 1 system ie "geekologie.com" which links to "the superficial" & "i watch stuff"
Gwendolyn is due January 28
Nope. The idea of a talking fetus is creepy. When is she due?
That is both creepy and hillarious at the same time -- *smile* -- Now I have to share a pic of my girl http://tinyurl.com/6mq2qt
@edgarbrault is the first dog I've seen to have a twitter account.
Ok, saving it for a blog entry later down the road. It could even make a good http://www.xkcd.com comic
@craigsutton if our future selves were successful in creating a time machine, we would have told ourselves about it by now?
0 hrs: once the project was done I would travel back in time. I do not see my future self, so I must have failed at creating it
Have you tried gerbils? Less power, but the battery life is twice as long.
you're right. tweetdeck is buggy for me too tonight
or put a superbowl ring on one finger
from that perspective yes, but its also so generic that i could be applied to any company
only if used on more than 20 elements
step away from the <font> tag, Adam. STEP AWAY
I hear they were bowling turkeys in the stables nearbye
great class. it provoked a lot of questions, which the teacher was able to answer. As for a tip, checkout babycenter.com
if the subtitles were in Comic Sans, then it would cease to being a documentary and become an allegory
Picked up "The underachiever's manifesto" at the gift exchange. Prty funny stuff. Ask @joeweakley about the invisible tape
Just got back from the Kingdom Builder seminar. There were some great classes on raising kids this weekend.
Photoshop CS4's animation panel appears to be buggy
*Yawn* Goodmorning ya scurvy dogs
WTB a grammar plugin for #TweetDeck
Just found out that my wife will not be receiving benefits from work for her pregnancy. Feeling a bit shocked.
Just changed my screen name to dougwaltman - lowercase so its easy to @ and not douglaswaltmanii so it's not so long to spell
Just got done Skyping my Mom in England. It's amazing how crystal clear it is.
I once stumbled across an IRC filtering program that never allowed u 2 duplicate a sentence. It blocked bots & forced ppl to think b4 typing
Clients still ask me to put "no right click" scripts on their pages to "protect" images... c'mon! It's 2008 ppl, I thought we were past this
Gotta go home and cook some sausage cheeseballs for the party tonight *drooool*
Excited about another gift exchange tonight. Do I use the awesome book I got from Tim, or use another giftcard?
Who out there uses multiple twitter accounts?
Anybody want to do lunch today at 12?
Followed right along with @junsten and @craigsutton and got rid of @TriCityHerald /done
My right brain thinks to fast for my left brain to code it all.
Must resist the urge to do donuts in parking lots in the snow.
my follow up question is "would you like me to photoshop the hand off for you?"
my question for Mack Collier is "who's hand is that on your shoulder in your pic?"
amazon. you wiley dog, you. here's my credit card number :)
one of the reasons I prefer twitter to other SM apps is that I only see content I subscribe to. i control wether or not I will get spam.
and a follow up to my last post: <button type="submit"> should replace <input type="submit">
Attention Coders: Please use the <button> tag instead of <input type="button">, thank you.
More snow!
WTB grammar checker for Tweetdeck
Just graduated birthing class. Do I feel like I'm ready to handle the challenge of fatherhood? Nope. Here's to trying though! *cheers*
sure, everyone head off to the chamber reception. I'll just sit back and do the chamber's website. I see how it is. *kidding*
